Entries.77771/f Sebastian 2000/w sunny/e 29/o Se: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Sebastian 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Hey @! Nice day isn't?"/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*mumbles* I'm so nervous... $4#$b#*mumbles* Okay, I can do this. $4" /emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 500/speak Sebastian "@, I am so happy that you came into my life, and you're the only one who made me feel like this. $4#$b#I always longed to get out of the valley, but now leaving you here breaks my heart. $4#$b# I could never leave you. I decided to stay.$4"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "$q 751912 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751911 10 accepted_Sebastian#Yes, I thought you'll never ask!#$r 751912 -500 rejected_Sebastian#No, I'm sorry"/fork forkProposalNoSebastian/emote Sebastian 20/speak Sebastian "Dang! I don't know what will I feel if you said 'No'.$h#$b#Thank you for listening!$4" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoSebastian: speak Sebastian "Oh. I'm sorry if I waste your time. I'm going now. $s" /end warpout

Entries.77772/f Alex 2000/w sunny/e 288847/o Ale: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Alex 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Alex "Hey @! Phew! This is a good day for an exercise right?"/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 500/speak Alex "Dang! I feel like my heart will burst! I'm too nervous.$4"/pause 500/emote Alex 28/faceDirection Alex 0/speak Alex "After my Mom died, I never expect to like another guy in my whole life. $4 ^ After my Mom died, I never expect to like another girl in my whole life. $4#$b#But when you came to town, everything changed. You became a part of my life. $4#$b#@, you're my rock and I want you there by my side.$4"/pause 500/speak Alex "$q 751914 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751913 10 accepted_Alex#Yes, I will stay by your side!#$r 751914 -500 rejected_Alex#No, I'm sorry."/fork forkProposalNoAlex/emote Alex 20/speak Alex "I'll See ya later! $4" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoAlex: speak Alex "Well, walking to your farm was still a great exercise. Later! $s" /end warpout

Entries.77773/f Harvey 2000/w sunny/e 571102/o H: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Harvey 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Harvey "Hey @! Just came by to talk with you... $3#$b#Uhm... Don't forget to eat apple a day! $4"/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 500/emote Harvey 12/faceDirection Harvey 0/pause 500/speak Harvey "Sorry, I'm super nervous.$4#$b#@, what I'm trying to say is... I always look forward to your visits to the clinic.$h" /emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Harvey "Wait! not like that, I mean... not when you come in battered and bruised!$7#$b# Let me start over... $4"s/pause 500/speak Harvey "@, I look forward to every moment with you and I can't bear the thought of not having you in my life.$4"/pause 500/speak Harvey "$q 751916 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751915 10 accepted_Harvey#Yes, I will!#$r 751916 -500 rejected_Harvey#No, I'm sorry."/fork forkProposalNoHarvey/emote Harvey 20/speak Harvey "Don't forget what I said, okay? Take care and have a nice day! $4" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoHarvey: speak Harvey "Uhm... Sorry to bother you. Take care, okay? $s" /end warpout

Entries.77774/f Shane 2000/w sunny/e 3900074/o S: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Shane 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Shane "Hey @! I took a walk and decided to drop by.$h#$b#My therapist said that I should take a walk in the mountains for a change."/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/emote Shane 12/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 500/speak Shane "Sorry, I'm kind of nervous.$4" /emote Shane 28/speak Shane "I thought my life will never change.$s#$b#That my life will be forever a mess... $s"/pause 500/speak Shane "Until I meet you. $4" /pause 500/speak Shane "You showed me that there's still hope for me. That you're there for me. $4#$b#@, you're the reason why I am still here..." /pause 500/speak Shane "I really like you. $4"/pause 500/speak Shane "$q 751918 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751917 10 accepted_Shane#Yes, I will continue to stay with you!#$r 751918 -500 rejected_Shane#No, I'm sorry."/fork forkProposalNoShane/emote Shane 20/speak Shane "Well, time to go! You have a long day ahead of you. See you later at the saloon.$h" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoShane: speak Shane "Uhm... Sorry to bother you. Take care, okay? $s" /end warpout

Entries.77775/f Sam 2000/w sunny/e 4081148/o Sam: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Sam 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Sam "Yo, @! I decided to take a ride with my skateboard to your farm.$h#$b#It was rocky because there is no pavements but it's fine.$h" /faceDirection Sam 3/pause 500/emote Sam 40/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/speak Sam "Sorry, I suddenly got nervous.$4"/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "Y'know @, I aim high for myself and the band. Thinking that there will be a life for me in the city if our band become well-known. #$b#But I guess... City life is not for me, and leaving you here makes my heart hurt so bad. $s#$b#I can't leave you alone. $4" /pause 500/speak Sam "I really like you, @! $4"/pause 500/speak Sam "$q 751920 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751919 10 accepted_Sam#Yes, of course I will!#$r 751920 -500 rejected_Sam#No, I'm sorry."/fork forkProposalNoSam/emote Sam 20/speak Sam "See you when I see you! Laters!$4" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoSam: speak Sam "I understand. Well, See you later. $s" /end warpout

Entries.77776/f Elliott 2000/w sunny/e 1848481/o: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Elliott 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Elliott "@, what a pleasant morning to start a new day don't you think?$h#$b#I was thinking about you so I decided to visit you.$h#$b#I hope you don't mind." /faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 500/emote Elliott 40/speak Elliott "... $s"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "OOh! There is nothing wrong. It's just that...$4"/emote Elliott 12/speak Elliott "It got me thinking about the past weeks that we are together.$h" /pause 500/speak Elliott "I suddenly realize how I'm happy that I have someone I can share all of my thoughts with.$h#$b#You've become someone special to me, @!"/pause 500 speak Elliott "I like you. These words perfectly express my feelings for you.$h" /Pause 500/speak Elliott "$q 751922 null#Will you be my boyfriend? ^ Will you be my girlfriend?#$r 751921 10 accepted_Elliott#Yes, I would love to!#$r 751922 -500 rejected_Elliott#No, I'm sorry."/fork forkProposalNoElliott/emote Elliott 20/speak Elliott "It would be lovely to spend a whole day with you but I must restrain myself for now. I'll see you soon.$h" /end warpout
Entries.forkProposalNoElliott: speak Elliott "I see. Well, I guess we don't feel the same way.$s" /pause 500/speak Elliott "...$s#$b#See you around, @.$3" /end warpout

Entries.77777/f Sebastian 2250/w Sunny/e 77771/o: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Sebastian 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Sebastian "@! It's been a while." /emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Well, since it was a good day today I wanna ask if you want to hangout with me or something? $4#$b# I just want to spend time with you, y'know.$h"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Since we started dating, we haven't spend enough time with each other, I'm busy working all day in front of the computer while you tend your farm, $4#$b#So I am hoping we can have time today together. $4"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "$q 751923 null#What do you think?#$r 751924 100 DateAccepted_Sebastian#Sure why not?#$r 751923 -100 DateRejected_Sebastian#No, I'm sorry, I'm busy."/fork forkNoDateSebastian/emote Sebastian 20/speak Sebastian "Come to my house at 5 PM after your work is done. Can't wait to see you! $h" /end warpout
Entries.forkNoDateSebastian: speak Sebastian "Well, I guess you really doesn't have time for me.$s" /pause 500/speak Sebastian "...$s#$b#Sorry to bother you.$3" /end warpout
Entries.forkNoWedPropSebastian: speak Sebastian "Well, if that's what you want. $s" /pause 500/speak Sebastian "Then I'll wait until you're ready. See you and goodnight. $h" /end newDay

Entries.77778/f Sebastian 2350/w sunny/q 751924/: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 1 4 2 Sebastian 5 6 3/Skippable/move farmer 0 2 2/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 500/emote Sebastian 20/speak Sebastian "@, glad you came. I was worried you'll not come since there is so much on your plate.$h#$b#But I am happy that you're here with me. Come, I prepared some things to do. I hope you like it. $h" /globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Watching movies with your love ones is the best." /changeLocation Farm/viewport 64 15/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 64 15 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/warp Sebastian 64 16 0/emote farmer 20/emote Sebastian 20/pause 500/textAboveHead Sebastian "Thanks for tonight." /pause 500/speak Sebastian "I really enjoyed our time today. I hope I can spend some time with you again. $h" /pause 500/speak Sebastian "Uhm..." /emote farmer 8/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "I want to ask something... Do you want to... take our relationship to next level? $4" /emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I am serious when I said that I want to stay with you. I just want to know if you feel the same way as I am. $4" /pause 500/speak Sebastian "$q 751925 null#Do you want to?#$r 751926 100 NextLevelAccepted_Sebastian#I would love to!#$r 751925 -100 NextLevelRejected_Sebastian#I don't want to." /fork forkNoWedPropSebastian/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Good night and sleep tight, @. $4" /globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Good night and sleep tight too. Sebastian." /end newDay

Entries.77779/f Alex 2250/w sunny/e 77772/o Alex: moonlightJellies/7 9/farmer 64 15 2 Alex 64 14 0/Skippable/pause 500/speak Alex "@! Hey, I just having an exercise right now and I suddenly want to... visit you. $h" /emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "Well... Actually... The truth is... I want to see you so I came to your farm, @. $4" /pause 500/speak Alex "Say... Are you busy? I want to spend some time with you. $4" /pause 500/speak Alex "$q 751927 null#What can you say?#$r 751928 100 DateAccepted_Alex#Sure! I'll come to you.#$r 751927 -100 DateRejected_Alex#Sorry, I can't. Busy." /fork forkNoDateAlex/pause 500/speak Alex "See you later in front of my house at 3PM! $h" /end warpout
Entries.forkNoDateAlex: speak Alex "Well, maybe we can do it next time" /pause 500/speak Alex "Hopefully... Well, see you around. Gonna run for awhile before going home. #$b#Later @!" /end warpout
Entries.forkNoWedPropAlex: speak Alex "Well. If that's what you want then I won't force you. But in case you change your mind, you can see me anytime. Catch you later." /end newDay

Entries.777710/f Alex 2350/w sunny/o Alex/t 1500: moonlightJellies/64 64/farmer 59 64 1 Alex 64 64 3/move farmer 3 0 1/skippable/pause 500/emote Alex 20/speak Alex "I'm glad you made it! I was wondering where you are! $h#$b#Thanks for being here with me today. I hope you enjoyed your time with me. C'mon, let's go to the beach and let's play some gridball. $h#$b#I'll teach you myself! I hope you don't mind having a teacher like me. $h" /emote farmer 20/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Learning how to play grindball from Alex is so enjoyable. Spending time with him makes time flew too fast." /changeLocation Beach/viewport 42 24/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 40 24/faceDirection Alex 2/warp Alex 41 24/textAboveHead Alex "That made me tired." /pause 700/speak Alex "Thanks @. Thanks for spending time with me. $4#$b#I read from the internet that sometimes you need to spend some time with your love ones. $4#$b#I am so happy that you agreed to be with me today. Hope you enjoyed our time as much as I do." /showFrame Alex 38/pause 500/showFrame Alex 37/pause 500/speak Alex "You know... @. I want to spend the rest of my days with you. $4#$b#I am serious about what I said." /faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/showFrame Alex 12/speak Alex "Here, let me take you home. $h" /globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Farm/viewport 64 15/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 64 15 2/faceDirection Alex 0/warp Alex 64 16 0/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Alex "Touch down. Thanks again, @!" /pause 500/emote Alex 12/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Alex "Well... I want to ask you something. I just want to make sure that... You're really serious about our relationship." /pause 500/speak Alex "$q 751929 null#What do you think about taking our relationship to next level?#$r 751930 100 NextLevelAccepted_Alex#I would love to!#$r 751729 -100 NextLevelRejected_Alex#No. I'm sorry." /fork forkNoWedPropAlex/pause 500/emote farmer 20/emote Alex 20/showFrame Alex 12/pause 500/speak Alex "See you around. Good night and Dream of me.$4#$b#Kidding. Laters! $h" /end newDay

Entries.accepted_Alex: Oh! That made me very happy! $h

Entries.accepted_Shane: I'm happy to hear that from you! $h

Entries.accepted_Sam: I'll make sure you won't regret your decision, @! $h

Entries.accepted_Elliott: You made me that happiest man on earth.$h

Entries.NextLevelAccepted_Sebastian: You always makes me smile, y'know that? Thank you, @!$h

Entries.DateAccepted_Alex: Nice! I can't wait to see you $h
Entries.NextLevelAccepted_Alex: You don't know how much you made me happy. $h
